abstract: Op-Ed article by research scholar Bruce G Blair asserts that large majority of current and former  nuclear missile launcher officers with whom he is acquainted have expressed serious concerns over possibility that Donald Trump would be in charge of country's nuclear arsenal; says preventing enemies from attacking United States, core responsibility of deterrence programs, depends on having responsible, composed and diplomatically-skilled commander in chief, qualities Trump clearly does not possess.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Nuclear launch officers count on the president to have sound judgment. That would not be possible under a President Trump....
lead_paragraph: Nuclear launch officers count on the president to have sound judgment. That would not be possible under a President Trump.
